slide_content_0:
APKPure is an open-source service that provides users with direct access to APK (Android application) files. These files can be downloaded on many devices that can run Android, including phones, tablets, e-readers, and specific models of computers, cameras, and smartwatches. You can access the service through its website, https://APKpure.com/, or its Android app.

ApkPure is known to allow its customers to download ".apk" and ".xapk" records without the need for Google PlayStore. There is an extremely real danger related to this site. Sites like these, including Apk-dl and Apkmirror, basically download apps from the Play Store and transfer the ".apk" document to their sites. These sites are also called external sources. ApkPure also recently released its Android phone app to use to download apps.

It may seem convenient to download the apk file from Apkpure. However, is it safe to download the apk file from Apkpure? Will the file contain a virus? Read along to find out the answer.
slide_title_1: 1. Why do people choose to download from APKPure?
slide_content_1:
But why do people choose to download apps from APK websites instead of Google Playstore? Here are some reasons why people choose to download from Apkpure:

To bypass geo-restrictions: The main reason people download apks from the above sites is to get region-specific apps. The promise of APKPure is that users can download region-specific apps. This way, they won't have to worry about problems like unavailability in your region.

Get the latest update: Most people download apks from the above sites to get the latest version of the app without waiting for the Google Play Store to roll out gradually to push the updates. To explain it in detail, the Google Play Store has the option of phased deployments to detect any major issues, stop the update, and provide a new update with fixes. Some features are also present in the latest update, but you want to try them right away. In this case, you can download the APK from sites like APKPure and get the latest functionality. Since these come from the original source, you won't have a problem with subsequent updates, either.

Access to older versions: Another reason why people use APKPure, rather than Google Play, is that you can access older versions of apps, including changelog information and descriptions. If you've downloaded the latest version of the software update of a mobile app and it starts to crash, you can go back to an older, more secure update. This will guide you until the new one is fixed. If you want, you can also continue using the previous version. You can also use the file for research purposes to compare changes from one version to another.

Freedom: A much smaller group of people who just don't want the Play Store installed on their phone believe, rightly or wrongly, this is their decision, that Google invades their privacy and avoids their products where they can.
slide_content_2:
There are a number of advantages in using APKPure:

  • The service is open-source, making it accessible to everyone
  • Further, using APKPure is user-friendly and intuitive: users can download and upload their APK files with a minimum of difficulty.
  • The website is available in many languages, including English, Vietnamese, French, Spanish, German, Russian, Dutch, Japanese, Turkish, and Polish. The many languages help advocate for its nature as a universal platform, on which you can download apps that would otherwise be region-locked
  • The service features quite a large library of mobile apps to choose from
  • Apps can be updated automatically, without need for root access. You can also download APKPure’s Android app on Google Play

In addition, the staff and personnel of the service are very helpful, and willing to work with all users to ensure that they have the safest experience possible, with as few hassles as possible. They act transparently toward their user base, and in the past have notified users about various goings-on with the service that might have affected them.

Finally, as you might expect from an app-based service, many mobile games are available on APKPure.

The most popular ones include Fortnite (the Battle Royale version); Apex Legends, a brand-new game that takes place in the Titanfall universe; the mobile version of PlayerUnknown’s Battleground, and much more
slide_content_3:
This abbreviations is short for “Android Package,” the file format that is used for both distributing and installing mobile apps on the Android platform. The abbreviation is used to designate middleware, which can be described as software that was developed to make other software run properly.

The file format is employed for all kinds of applications. On APKPure, it’s used to designate all kinds of apps. This category includes games—including both mobile-native games and games that were ported to mobile operating systems – Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook and Messenger, WhatsApp, YouTube, and Amazon Prime.

Finally, you’ll note that this abbreviation can be found whenever users are discussing Android and its apps. For example, it’s used on other Android app stores that run on the same principles as APKPure. Developers will also use the term when discussing their own Android apps.
slide_content_4:
An Android Package Kit (APK for short) is the package file format used by the Android&nabsp;operating system for distribution and installation of mobile apps. Just like Windows (PC) systems use an .exe file for installing software, the APK does the same for Android.

When you download an APK online, you're essentially getting an app. Most users get apps from the Google Play Store, without ever seeing the word APK. But there are occasions when you would want to do otherwise.

In 2021, Google started phasing out APK files on the Play Store, replacing them with the more flexible AAB format. But because AAB files are custom-made to each device, they require different steps to install.
slide_title_5: 5. Why would I want to install an APK File?
slide_content_5:
APK files of new Android builds are often leaked ahead of time, giving you early access to all the exciting new features that otherwise wouldn't be available to you. Also, some apps are restricted to regions outside of your own. App updates can take a frustrating amount of time to arrive automatically over the air. Getting the latest APK for your favorite apps will let you jump the queue. Or you might even not like a particular app after an update, and want to install an older version instead.

And if your Android device lacks access to the Google Play Store, APK files may be your only option for installing apps on your device.

  • Accidentally deleted the Google Play Store?, here's how to get the APK and restore it

Be careful though, you don't want to download stolen apps. Some APK services let you download pirated apps. This is illegal and should be avoided. Worse still, sketchy APK files may contain malware, as many who thought they were getting early versions of Fortnite for Android discovered to their dismay. Do some research before you download so you don't do anything against the law or contaminate your device.
slide_content_6:
If you want to download mobile apps onto your phone, tablet, or other device, then this service is a safe choice. Users simply upload their own APK files to the website, and then, in turn, you can download those files onto your device.

In the interim, however, the skilled staff members of APKPure will take a look at the file and ensure that it meets the website’s guidelines, before they allow users like you to download it. Owing to the high volume of apps under review, it usually takes three or so days for the staff to give their approval to any given APK file.

The service also takes care to match the file on their own website with the file of the same application that’s already available in the database of the Google Play Store. The cryptographic signatures of both apps are compared, allowing the staff of APKPure to see whether or not the file is the same.

Generally, the file is the same – with the ultimate result of greater security for end users. This feature is particularly helpful because APKs that were downloaded from other websites are not necessarily secure. They might have had a secure file as a baseline, which was later modified or tampered with to incorporate malware as part of its structure.

This being said, it’s true that no web service is completely safe: problems related to security can always arise. Indeed, this is especially the case when a website, like APKPure, is open to the public, so that users can upload APK files from their own devices.

However, the staff of APKPure are also ready and willing to deal with any issues you may have, including security issues. They even ask, on their website, that – if you’ve been experiencing problems of any kind when using the service – that you tell them about the problem.

This ensures that they can best devote their resources to repairing the issue.
slide_content_7:
Aside from the region-specific considerations, there are a number of reasons why you might want to use an unofficial APK-based app, rather than going on Google’s Play Store, to purchase your items.

For one thing, the apps on the Play Store are not completely secured. There is no guarantee that they are 100% safe. Indeed, in 2017, Google’s staff members were forced to take more than seven hundred thousand apps off the website, since they violated Google Play’s reasonable policies.

This group of apps includes more than 7,000 apps that violated Google’s safety measures – thus presenting an unknown, and potentially very dangerous, security risks. Plus, this group includes many malware apps, which would have engaged in SMS fraud and phishing, as well as delivering Trojan viruses to operating systems.

It’s true, of course, that an app downloaded off the APKPure service is also not necessarily completely secure. The site allows users to upload their apps. When you open a service like that up to the community – security risks are always present.

However, the staff and customer-support personnel of APKPure have historically been open and honest with their users. They have worked with them through problems and notified them of potential, developing security risks.

Plus, the market of people using APKPure is much smaller than the incredibly vast market of people using the Play Store. This means that there’s a smaller chance of you finding a security risk.
slide_title_8: 8. Files on APKPure include older versions, changelogs, and descriptions
slide_content_8:
Another reason to use APKPure, rather than Google Play, is that you can access older versions of apps, including changelog info and descriptions.

If you downloaded the newer version or software update of a mobile app and it starts crashing on you, you can simply roll back to an earlier, safer update. This will tide you over until the new one is repaired. If you want, you can even keep using the older version.

This database also constitutes an archive of older versions of apps that can be used for research purposes, if you’re developing your own app, or if you want to compare changes from one update of the app to the previous version.
slide_title_9: 9. Is it Safe to Download Mods from APKPure?
slide_content_9: The developers of HappyMod use good old fashioned testing and AI to ensure that mods are safe to use. Every mod that is uploaded to the catalog is there for users to test, and the developers only ask that you comment on how good the mod is, whether there are any problems, what doesn’t work and what can be improved. They then use those comments to move the best mods to the top of the list. You can help by testing mods and telling everyone what you think of them and by uploading any mods that you find too.
